column1: 東京都統計年鑑（令和3年）TOKYO STATISTICAL YEARBOOK ( 2021 )　21  財政 21  PUBLIC FINANCE
21-9  公有財産 (2) 区有 (平成29～令和3年度末) 21-9  PUBLIC ASSETS (2) ASSETS OWNED BY KU ( End of Fiscal Years 2017-2021 )
注 1) 千代田区は、工作物は区有財産現在額（価格）を固定資産台帳で管理し、公有財産台帳では現在高（数量）のみ管理しているため、価格は記載していない。そのため、総額、行政財産及び普通財産の合計には、工作物の金額を除いた金額を掲載している。
2）行政財産の有価証券，出資金等について，中央区は動産及び地上権を含む。 港区は地上権を含む。品川区は地上権，地役権及び浮桟橋を含む。大田区は動産及び用益物権（地上権）を含む。渋谷区は温泉権及び無体財産権を含む。足立区は地役権及び地上権を含む。葛飾区は地上権を含む。
3）普通財産の有価証券，出資金等について，千代田区は温泉受給権を含む。中央区は特許権を含む。港区は特許権等を含む。新宿区は不動産の信託の受益権を含む。大田区は無体財産を含む。杉並区は地役権等及び特許権等を含む。豊島区は商標権を含む。北区は地上権を含む。荒川区は無体財産権を含む。板橋区は無体財産（著作権及び商標権）を含む。葛飾区は特許権等を含む。

Note: 1) For Chiyoda-ku, the value of structures is not listed because the current asset value of ku-owned structures is recorded in a fixed asset ledger, while the public property ledger only records the current amount (quantity) of structures. For that reason, the value of structures is excluded from the total value figures and the totals of administrative assets and non-administrative assets.

2) Regarding securities, investments, etc. under administrative assets, Chuo-ku includes movable assets and right of superficies. Minato-ku includes right of superficies. Shinagawa-ku includes right of superficies, easement, and floating piers. Ota-ku includes movable assets and usufructuary rights (right of superficies). Shibuya-ku includes hot spring rights and intangible asset rights. Adachi-ku includes easement and right of superficies. Katsushika-ku includes right of superficies.

3) Regarding securities, and investments, etc. under non-administrative assets, Chiyoda-ku includes rights to the supply of hot spring water. Chuo-ku includes patent rights. Minato-ku includes patent rights, etc. Shinjuku-ku includes real estate trust beneficiary rights. Ota-ku includes intangible assets. Suginami-ku includes easement and patent rights, etc. Toshima-ku includes trademark rights. Kita-ku includes right of superficies. Arakawa-ku includes intangible asset rights. Itabashi-ku includes intangible assets (copyrights and trademark rights). Katsushika-ku includes patent rights, etc.
資料：公益財団法人特別区協議会事業部調査研究課 Source: Public Interest Foundation of Tokyo Metropolitan Area Cities
（単位　金額　百万円）(Value in millions of yen)
